channel.title: pyuk2005 on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in pyuk2005 on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: ACCU Friday
item.description: Well we made it back to Indiana last night after about 12 hours of blissfully uneventful travel.

item.title: ACCU Keynote, Day 2
item.description: This morning’s keynote wasn’t nearly as interesting as Bjarne’s yesterday.

item.title: London Calling
item.description: So today was my first day at PyUK, which is being presented as part of the ACCU Conference .

item.title: Mr. CC Goes to Washington… and Oxford
item.description: It’s time for that annual rite of Python: PyCon .
